data.text: @CTVNews Good, no point anyways. Time to end this current governments power grab
@CTVNews Don't care what mayors or truckers say.......what does public health say. Every unqualified opinion does not have to be a headline.

@CTVNews Also the covid Positive result scams going on in tourist destinations. Loved ones left behind with fake positives to isolate and pay the hotel & doctor more money to recoup losses. PCR positive result and while isolated 5 rapids completed all with negative results. #Scams
@Tweetfreek @CTVNews thats because you're a nazi scumbag.. maybe try not discriminating against people for the presence of a useless RNA that has proven to do nothing to slow the spread of covid.
@ddryan60 @CTVNews The US requires you to be vaccinated to travel there so I don’t see how you’d plan on returning from there if you weren’t.

@CTVNews Well maybe if the mayors would have supported the truckers more the mandates would have ended!  Seems like asking for things or drafting strongly worded letters to the MP’s just does not get the same results as a good ol protest.
